articles.author: Chris Loh
articles.title: Go First CEO: We Could Be Back In A Week - Simple Flying
articles.description: After declaring bankruptcy, the head of Go First says that the airline can resume operations if certain conditions are met.
articles.content: It's been less than a week since Indian budget airline Go First announced the cancelation of flights and its filing for bankruptcy. While many were aware that Pratt & Whitney's geared turbofan (G… [+3143 chars]
